name: The Other Side (Gaming Project at VT)
name_original: The Other Side (Gaming Project at VT)
description:
Chicken Controls:
WASD - Side/Fwd/Bwd Movement

Space - Jump in same lane over cars

Shift - Dash with stamina

TimeLord Controls:

NM,./ - Slow down lanes by pressing once, then release the lanes by pressing again. The keys from left to right control the lanes from bottom to top respectively.
